featured.text: They draw elegant henna crowns on the women’s bare heads to help them 18 the loss of their hair after cancer treatment.
Picture an elegant restaurant in Saratoga Springs, New York, in 1853.
He can easily adopt an elegant for a camera shoot.

definition.zh_def: 優雅的，精緻的，具有高雅風格或品味的。
definition.en_def: Graceful and stylish in appearance or manner.
definition.example: She wore an elegant dress to the gala.
